newsitem.title: USA: MAPCO says units acquire Halron units.
newsitem.headline: MAPCO says units acquire Halron units.

text.p: MAPCO Inc said Thursday its retail propane marketing business Thermogas Co has acquired the retail operation of the privately-held Halron Propane Co Inc.
A company spokesman declined to disclose terms of the deal.
The company also said its wholesale marketing business Gas Supply acquired Halron's wholesale operation.

The company said Halron markets propane to 1,400 retail customers in Green Bay and northeast Wisconsin and has annual retail sales of 2.7 million gallons. Halron's wholesale business has annual sales of 4.2 millon gallons.
